CS:GO is a tactical fps game, that, 950 hours in, i'm still as amazed and in love with it as when i first got it. Whether it's a strategically executed bombsite split, or a rush b on a pistol round, every different round and game is unique. I've tried other fps games but none of them give the same experience as cs. I highly recommend, 10/10
